about_the_game:
How To Get Involved Pre-Release

Wishlist, follow, and join our Discord for opportunities to play in early playtests and help craft the game. We would love to get a small core group of players who love the tower defense and bullet heaven genres so we can make a great game that fits your tastes!

Explore the Campaign

Welcome to the world of Valber! In TransmuTowers, you will explore Valber through a variety of maps, each with their own resources, challenges, and monsters to defeat.

Build a New City Each Level

Establish a foothold on these maps, starting with a small camp and building up to a flourishing base where you can generate resources and build up your strength. Always restarting your cities in games? Our 20-30-min stage-based gameplay will allow you to try numerous base layouts and strategies, and reward you for it!

Defend against the Hordes

Each stage will feature new monsters to conquer, requiring the use of different strategies to beat the highest difficulties. Unlock new towers and effects rapidly as you play the game.

Core Features:

Defend multiple scenic locations throughout the campaign
Roguelike Meta-progression for unlocking new strategies
Real-time strategic decision-making, No pre-defined monster paths here
Dozens of towers with hundreds of upgrades
Randomized powerful augments each level to keep each game fresh
Ability to play solo or with friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 3.0 gHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS @ 1080p Lowest Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any Modern Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 4k/2160p Highest Settings

short_description: The Kingdom is under attack! Collect resources, build towers, buy upgrades and work alone (or with up to 3 friends) to defend it! Select your favorite Alchemist from a magical coven, and fend off innumerable hordes of beasts in this post-apocalyptic fantasy world.
